actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to increase the penalties imposed for the disclosure of restricted data thereunder, and to provide that any person disclosing such data shall be subject to such penalties without regard to his employment by or relationship to the Federal agency or agencies involved.

summary.text: Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to increase the penalties imposed for the disclosure of restricted data, and to expand the scope of the prohibition against such disclosures to include any person, regardless of his relationship to the Federal agencies involved.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to increase the penalties imposed for the disclosure of restricted data thereunder, and to provide that any person disclosing such data shall be subject to such penalties without regard to his employment by or relationship to the Federal agency or agencies involved.
